H0.text: Scottish footballer Kenny Dalglish played for which English club from 1977 to 1990. Liverpool Fan

H1.text: Scottish footballer Kenny Dalglish played for which English club from 1977 to 1990. Evertonian

H2.text: Scottish footballer Kenny Dalglish played for which English club from 1977 to 1990. Manchester United Player

H3.text: Scottish footballer Kenny Dalglish played for which English club from 1977 to 1990. Kopite

A4.text: Dalglish was signed by Liverpool manager Bob Paisley for a British transfer fee record of £440,000 in 1977.

A5.text: Dalglish made his debut for Liverpool on 13 August 1977 and played there until 1990.

A6.text: In the 2011–12 season, Liverpool secured a record eighth League Cup success and reached the FA Cup final, but finished eighth in the Premier League, their worst league finish in 18 years; this led to the sacking of Dalglish.

A7.text: Dalglish cited the Hillsborough disaster and its repercussions as the reason for his resignation in 1991.
